A prime illustration is the Career Talk conference, where executive officers from real professional works served as esteemed guests and keynote speakers. These […]
item.content:encoded:
Exploring Knowledge Horizons: IBA-JU Seminars and Workshops

IBA-JU Business Club stands as a beacon of intellectual growth, hosting impactful seminars and workshops that empower students for the challenges of the business world. A prime illustration is the Career Talk conference, where executive officers from real professional works served as esteemed guests and keynote speakers. 

These events offer practical insights from industry experts, with notable figures providing valuable perspectives on the banking sector and career prospects. Beyond knowledge, these gatherings create networking opportunities, transforming the seminar space into a platform for students to engage with professionals and build connections that may shape their future careers.

As IBA-JU Business Club continues to host transformative events, the impact on students’ intellectual and professional growth becomes evident. Each seminar and workshop contributes to a dynamic environment where students not only gain knowledge but also develop essential skills and expand networks for success in their chosen fields. IBA-JU Business Club remains dedicated to shaping well-rounded, future-ready business leaders through these enriching experiences.

Hosted by the IBA-JU Business Club, this two-part series empowered aspiring investigators with insights from experts like Mohammad Shahriar Hossain and Anastacia Mukanova. They tackled money laundering, fraud, and more, […]
item.content:encoded:
Unveiling the Mystery of Financial Crimes: “Embezzled” Recap

 

“Embezzled” wasn’t just a webinar, it was a portal into the hidden world of financial crime. Hosted by the IBA-JU Business Club, this two-part series empowered aspiring investigators with insights from experts like Mohammad Shahriar Hossain and Anastacia Mukanova. They tackled money laundering, fraud, and more, leaving participants ready to combat these ever-evolving threats.

 

And it wasn’t all theory. The Mentee Quiz tested their knowledge while adding a dash of friendly competition. “Embezzled” wasn’t just about understanding, it was about connection. It provided a platform for career exploration and networking, fueling the Club’s vision to equip future financial crime fighters nationwide.

Stay tuned for more transformative events from the IBA-JU Business Club, as they continue to pave the path for a safer financial future.

item.title: Elicit
item.dc:creator: ibajubc
item.description: Elicit, the gateway to a vibrant journey at IBA-JU Business Club! Our club is designed to identify and nurture the latent potential within the incoming talent pool and we believe that “Elicit”, a rebranded form of our recruitment program, is the gateway for emerging leaders to embark on a dynamic voyage in the business […]
item.content:encoded:
Elicit, the gateway to a vibrant journey at IBA-JU Business Club! 

 

Our club is designed to identify and nurture the latent potential within the incoming talent pool and we believe that “Elicit”, a rebranded form of our recruitment program, is the gateway for  emerging leaders to embark on a dynamic voyage in the business world.

 

At ‘Elicit,’ we do not just recruit; we harness and celebrate the potential that propels future leaders into the limelight. In this few days long journey, we foster an environment where every participant is encouraged to push boundaries and embrace their entrepreneurial  qualities. Our finely crafted challenges and activities are designed to draw out your innate leadership qualities, setting the stage for your journey towards success.

 

On our latest Elicit 2.0, enthusiastic juniors joined on respective days filled with assessments that challenged, activities that inspired, and interactions that forged connections. We believe in blending professionalism with a touch of fun because we understand that great leaders are not just skilled, they are charismatic and adaptable. To sum up, this is your chance to step into the spotlight, where your journey as a business luminary begins from IBA-JU.

item.title: No Limit To 60 Minutes
item.dc:creator: ibajubc
item.description: “No Limits to 60 Minutes” is the flag bearer of a diversified mentorship and networking event that brings together today’s most inspiring and transforming business leaders to share their life-changing experiences and valuable insights. The mentors bring in their experience while on the other hand, the current students bring in their new thoughts- a combination […]
item.content:encoded:
“No Limits to 60 Minutes” is the flag bearer of a diversified mentorship and networking event that brings together today’s most inspiring and transforming business leaders to share their life-changing experiences and valuable insights. The mentors bring in their experience while on the other hand, the current students bring in their new thoughts- a combination that is ought to bring out the best in our young fresh minds.

 

We can definitely vouch for this to be a unique event as it only takes up  60 minutes which is a short limited time that makes sure to keep the participants attentive till the end. They get to learn about the real world of business and insights of our renowned alumni and seniors through these sessions. Along with these teachings, the students also get the chance to build a long lasting network consisting of the prominent alumni of the institution. 

 

The success of “No Limits to 60 Minutes Vol.01” where we brought in 5 remarkable mentors-all expertise in their own sectors, is the demonstration of the necessity of such mentorship programs and the way it helps the students to conquer their fear of getting lost in the way of achieving their goals.

item.title: Crack The Case
item.dc:creator: ibajubc
item.description: Crack The Case is a yearly specialized Business Case Solving Workshop designed for IBA-JU Business students interested in navigating the world of Business Competitions. Our respected alumni along with other renowned teams in the business competition arena, who have excelled in such competitions before, join us to clarify the process of solving business cases. […]
item.content:encoded:
Crack The Case is a yearly specialized Business Case Solving Workshop designed for IBA-JU Business students interested in navigating the world of Business Competitions. Our respected alumni along with other renowned teams in the business competition arena, who have excelled in such competitions before, join us to clarify the process of solving business cases.

 

Learning from the firsthand experiences of seniors serves as a significant motivator for the students. All inquiries about team formation, analysis, presentation, and common challenges are addressed as they generously share their journey to success.

 

In line with past editions, Crack The Case consistently aims to support newcomers in the realm of Business Competition. This year marked the 5th season of the event, bringing valuable insights and perspectives for the juniors.

item.title: Transcend
item.dc:creator: ibajubc
item.description: “Transcend” serves as a curated panel discussion and FGD event, creating a convergence for industry leaders and students to engage in a dialogue about the country’s current economy and beyond. This event provides students with a unique opportunity to openly interact with distinguished leaders, gaining firsthand insights into the country’s industries. The aim is […]
item.content:encoded:
“Transcend” serves as a curated panel discussion and FGD event, creating a convergence for industry leaders and students to engage in a dialogue about the country’s current economy and beyond.

 

This event provides students with a unique opportunity to openly interact with distinguished leaders, gaining firsthand insights into the country’s industries. The aim is to cultivate transformative conversations that imprint a lasting impact on participants’ thought processes and inspire fresh perspectives.

 

This year being the 5th edition, builds on past successes, focusing on a vital topic within the dynamic realms of SMEs, startups, and Social Businesses, mirroring the ever-evolving landscape of our world. Transcend 5.0 was held with 5 founding icons and 10 pre-selected students for a productive session with the rest of IBA-JU in attendance.

item.title: Breaking Brand
item.dc:creator: ibajubc
item.description: “Breaking Brand” is a signature intra-business case competition of IBA-JU BC that brings together the vibrancy of creativity and strategic thinking. Tailored for the aspiring juniors of IBA-JU, this event invites teams of 3-4 members to collaborate, guided by the proficient seniors, in a spirited quest for solutions. For juniors without prior business competition […]
item.content:encoded:
“Breaking Brand” is a signature intra-business case competition of IBA-JU BC that brings together the vibrancy of creativity and strategic thinking. Tailored for the aspiring juniors of IBA-JU, this event invites teams of 3-4 members to collaborate, guided by the proficient seniors, in a spirited quest for solutions.

 

For juniors without prior business competition experience, Breaking Brand serves as a unique entry point. Beyond the thrill of competition, it is a dynamic platform fostering teamwork and innovative problem-solving. With the hands-on guidance from seniors, the participants not only gain valuable insights into case-solving but also find motivation to venture into more business competitions, shaping the next generation of business leaders. 

 

This event also serves as a springboard for juniors, propelling them to actively participate in other competitions. Looking ahead, IBA-JU Business Club envisions taking Breaking Brand to the national stage, providing a larger platform for budding talents to showcase their skills on a broader scale.
